text: The Sawtooth Mountains are low ridges on the North Shore of Lake Superior in the U.S. state of Minnesota. They extend about 30 miles (50 km) from Carlton Peak near Tofte on the west, to Grand Marais on the east.Upham, pp. 3, 147. ==References== Category:Geography of Minnesota Category:Mountain ranges of the United States
title: Sawtooth Mountains (Minnesota)
